name: node-red-node-gaian
description: A Node-RED node to read and write to a gaian database using JDBC
readme: node-red-node-gaian ======================== A Node-RED node to read and write to a Gaian database. Install ------- Run the following command in the root directory of your Node-RED install npm install node-red-node-gaian The derbyclient.jar file containing the JDBC driver should be copied into {node-red-node-gaian-install-directory}/jars. Usage ----- Allows basic access to a Gaian database using the JDBC protocol This node uses can query or update the configured database. By it's very nature it allows SQL injection... so be careful out there... The result rows can be sent together as an array or as individual messages.. A Server configuration specifies the server, database and credentials to access.
